summary: Memorandum regarding a meeting with Colonel Porres concerning special treatment for individuals involved with Lyon Sosa, Luis Augusto Turcios Lima, Manuel Joue Ortega Paz, and others who received guerrilla warfare training in Cuba. Discussion also includes the Alfaro case, Luiz Ramirez case, and Hector Jordi Chambonyer case.
title: Meeting with Colonel Porres Saturday, 10 October 1964
